attributes.action: Raise Death Duties Tax Threshold to take Millions out of the Tax Trap:-
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Standardise our death duties tax system to match those in other European countries. 
We should either:-
1. have a much higher minimum figure which reflectes the growth in people's personal wealth [ eg £750,000 to 1,000,000] or 
2. have no death duties on properety which has been owned for 10 yrs or more.or 
3. have a very low tax [10%]on amount above £500,000.

The above are based on other european countries systems, who we should be aligning the UK to.
